title: Photographic memory: a portrait of Mervyn Bishop
creator_credit: Warwick Thornton, Penny McDonald and Chili Films
brief_description: A documentary about the life and photography of Mervyn Bishop, one of Australia’s leading indigenous professional photographers who broke new ground during the 1960’s and 1970’s as a media photographer. Bishop’s extensive archive of photographs offer an invaluable document of aspects of Australian and Aboriginal life over the past 40 years.
